Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The village comes into view if you go
<clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff> down this road and follow
the <clr:0000>signs<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>If you're going to the coast, be careful.
You'll be in a world of trouble if those
<clr:0000>pirates <clr:ffff>spot you.
Talk_123: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, the savior. Thank you for coming.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Though it's not much to look at now, after
the <clr:0000>monsters <clr:ffff>got to it. In the blink of an
eye, they ruined the whole village.<sp:5:1:0>
The restaurant my wife had just opened,
our house, everything...<sp:5:1:0> Gone.

They just came cruising in on their boat
like a bunch of <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>. So that's what
we're calling them—<clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're going to the coast, be careful.
You don't want them to spot you.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>Back again?<sp:0:4:0>I can't imagine why you keep coming
out here.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If the pirates were gone and it was safe
to return to <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>, we'd know.<sp:0:4:0>The head of the village, the others who
stayed behind—they'd have sent word.<sp:0:4:0>I'm telling you, this rain's nothing
compared to the dangers you'd face
in the village.
But if you've got a death wish...
News_59:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Cool. Some superstar is making waves in
the Lurelin Water Rally. Let's see...
News_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's see. The latest article is,
"Resort Restored and Ready for YOU!<sp:0:4:0>"Lurelin Village has returned to its former
beauty, with locals crediting one man as
the savior behind its comeback story."
How about that! In the news again!
Talk_110:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have two growing boys, so we can barely
fit in the house ourselves. If you need a
place to stay, inquire at the...
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ah, that's right.<sp:5:0:0> The inn was destroyed.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Sorry...
News_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>And the "golden-haired hero"...
That must be the guy who fought the
pirates and rebuilt our house!
Talk_111:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have two growing boys, so we can barely
fit in the house ourselves. If you need a
place to stay, inquire at the...
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ah, that's right.<sp:5:0:0> The inn was destroyed.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Sorry to leave you out in the rain.
News_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>I can't believe I met someone important
enough to be in the news!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>With those <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff> around, though,
I'd recommend you stay far away.
Talk_112:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, it's you! You're looking very dapper
in that shirt!
News_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm glad our house was rebuilt.<sp:0:4:0>But the village as a whole has a ways
to go. Cloyne's Lucky Treasure Shop is
still closed for repairs.
Quite the attraction that was, for locals
and out-of-towners alike. Cloyne always
went out of his way to give great <clr:0000>prizes<clr:ffff>.
I hope it gets fixed soon.
Talk_113:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, it's the village savior! You're looking
very dapper in that shirt!
News_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm glad our house was rebuilt.<sp:0:4:0>But there's work to do yet. Chessica's inn
is still closed for repairs.<sp:0:4:0>Folks would come from far and wide to
experience her... What was it? <clr:0000>Salt spa<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>I hope it gets fixed soon.
News_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>"Lurelin Water Rally High Scores Still
Unbeaten." Interesting...
Talk_114:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm? Oh, the house is cramped as is.
I can't let you stay over.<sp:0:4:0>Sorry about that. We can only hope the
<clr:0000>inn<clr:ffff> gets rebuilt soon.
News_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>"Lurelin Water Rally Scores Still
Unbeaten. Who Will Take Up the
Challenge?"
Interesting...<sp:5:0:0> So, no one new's managed
to top the scoreboard, huh?<sp:5:0:0> I can't wait
to see who shatters these records!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are you trying to reach <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>You know, the shops, the inn—<sp:5:0:0>all of it
was destroyed by <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I won't stop you, but with the pirates
still in town, going there would be like
throwing your life away.
Talk_116: <sp:3:0:2:0a01>Sorry to leave you out in the rain.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I wonder if there's some way to get those
pirates out of Lurelin Village.
Talk_117:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm? Oh, the house is cramped as is.
I can't let you stay over.<sp:0:4:0>Sorry to leave you out in the rain. We can
only hope the <clr:0000>inn<clr:ffff> gets rebuilt soon.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's not often that we see travelers here
after nightfall.
near_01: I hope the village is OK...
News_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>"Skilled Wave Rider Has What It Takes to
Beat Lurelin Water Rally Records."
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's not often that we see travelers here in
such gloomy weather.
Talk_119:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Oh...<sp:5:0:0> I was just nodding off. Do you need
something? It's pretty late.
News_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>"Lurelin Water Rally Records Challenged!
Rider Conquers Course at High Speeds!"
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's not often that we see travelers make
their way out here.
News_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's see here. The latest article is,
"Lurelin Village Makes a Splash." Hm!<sp:0:4:0>"Hyrule's favorite vacation spot is
accepting challengers for a new racing
competition on the waves!"<sp:0:4:0>Ah, that's the thing they set up at the end
of <clr:0000>Korne Beach<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Bet it'd be fun to watch! I'll have to take
the boys sometime soon.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If the pirates were gone and it was safe
to return to <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>, we'd know.<sp:0:4:0>The head of the village, the others who
stayed behind—<sp:5:0:0>they'd have sent word.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>But if you've got a death wish...
News_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's see here. The latest article is,
"Famed Lurelin Shop Shutters." Hm!<sp:0:4:0>"Lurelin's general store was once famed
for its wide-ranging selection of rare
goods, imported from all over Hyrule.
"But when the shopkeeper's boat floated
away, so too did his hopes of reopening
the beloved boutique."
Ah. <sp:5:0:0>This is about poor Garini at the pier.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>His shop was famous enough to merit a
front-page article, hm? It really did have
an excellent selection.
I hope that boat is found soon.
News_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's see here. The latest article is,
"Lurelin Village's New Publicity Push!"
Ah, interesting...
"The village head's daughter, a young
woman named Ralera, announced she is
creating a logo for the small fishing town."
Ah!<sp:5:0:0> I did hear that Rozel and Ralera
had returned.<sp:0:4:0>Is this really front-page news though?
Either Lurelin Village is more famous than
I thought, or it's a slow news day.
News_60:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You can't stop the hype boat!<sp:5:1:0> Destination:<sp:5:0:0>
SHATTERED RECORD ISLAND!
News_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's see here. The latest article is,
"Village Head Makes His Next Move." Hm!<sp:0:4:0>"Mr. Rozel, the head of a recovering town
called Lurelin Village, will stop at nothing
to attract visitors with new attractions."
Ha, I don't doubt it. He and Bolson spend
hours a day talking over by <clr:0000>Korne Beach<clr:ffff>.
Who knows what they're planning?
I'm excited to see what they do!
News_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I met that guy while I was living in a tent!
And now the newspaper's calling him
a "savior"!
Talk_102:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I didn't realize my boys were being so
considerate of my feelings.<sp:0:4:0>They grow up faster than you think.
News_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's see. The latest article is, "Lurelin
Village on the Mend." Huh!<sp:0:4:0>"After a golden-haired hero did away with
the pirates, rebuilding began with the
architect Mr. Bolson leading the way."
That's us! They're talking about
our village!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Then again, everyone has their reasons
for going places. It's not as though we
ended up here by choice.
Do you know <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>? We used to
live there.
Talk_103:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey!<sp:5:0:0> You're wearing my blue shirt!
You're the spitting image of me as a
young man!
News_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm glad our house was rebuilt.<sp:0:4:0>But Armes isn't so lucky. Poor man's still
sleeping out in the cold.<sp:0:4:0>He's a good man, Armes. Always used to
<clr:0000>share<clr:ffff> what he'd caught while fishing.<sp:0:4:0>I hope his house gets fixed soon.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Gah, this rain! I wonder if <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>
is getting hit this hard...
Talk_104:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm? This isn't an inn. The inn is that
building shaped like a boat, across the
way from here.
Guess you're a little sleepy, huh?
News_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm glad our house was rebuilt.<sp:0:4:0>I wonder, though, when the village head's
house will be repaired.<sp:0:4:0>His daughter was planning to visit,
I heard, but I doubt she'll want to sleep
on a pile of rubble...
I hope it gets fixed soon.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Some weather, huh? Are you sheltering
here too?
Talk_105:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm? This isn't an inn. The inn is that
building shaped like a boat, across the
way from here.
Guess even the village savior gets sleepy
sometimes, huh?
News_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's see here. The latest article is,
"Lurelin Store Reopens Its Doors!<sp:0:4:0>"The popular general store is finally
back open for business!

"Its fabulous owner, Mubs, has also
opened a new franchise elsewhere."

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah!<sp:5:0:0> This is about Garini's shop at the pier!<sp:0:4:0>That really is quite the store. Now that
it's open again, we villagers will be able
to enrich our lives with <clr:0000>rare goods<clr:ffff>!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's a small fishing town. You'll see it if
you go <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff> down this road and
follow the <clr:0000>signs<clr:ffff>.
Talk_106:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have two growing boys, so we can
barely fit in the house ourselves. If you
need a place to stay, inquire at the inn.
News_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's see here. The latest article is,
"Lurelin Village's New Publicity Push."
Ah, interesting...
"The village head's daughter, young
Ms. Ralera, has designed a village logo
that she hopes will attract more visitors."
Ah. <sp:5:0:0>So that's why they sent me that flag.<sp:0:4:0>It's strange. When the pirates attacked,
I thought our little fishing town was as
good as done for.<sp:0:4:0>But now the village is thriving. It's better
than ever before.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I come from <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>, a small fishing
community surrounded by ocean.

I'd have loved to take you there and show
you around.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>But it's been captured by <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>, so for
safety reasons, no one's allowed to enter.<sp:0:4:0>My wife had just opened a restaurant
in town too. Some timing that was...
News_35:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>*sigh* <sp:5:1:0>My poor shirt. What should I do? I'll try to
distract myself by reading the paper...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_120:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>How about a meal at my wife's
restaurant?
Talk_109:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Liking the shirt, huh? I'm glad I gave it
to a worthy wearer!
News_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oho! "Challengers Needed for the
Lurelin Water Rally!

"The newly established water rally in
Hyrule's best resort is waiting for racers!"

<sp:3:0:2:0501>That's the big dealie they built at the end
of <clr:0000>Korne Beach<clr:ffff>... Seems like nobody's
crossed the finish line there yet.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Maybe I ought to give it a try!
Talk_121:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>There's no need for you to pay, of course!
Stop by and we'll serve you for free.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Go straight down this road to the
<clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>... The place is off toward
the sea.
If you want to go to <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>,
use the <clr:0000>signs<clr:ffff> along the road to guide
you there.
Talk_122: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, it's you. Thank you for coming.
